title: Build native image error

labels.name: triage/needs-reproducer
labels.description: We are waiting for a reproducer.

body:
### Describe the bug

Build native image error.

```bash
./mvnw clean package -Dquarkus.container-image.push=true -Pnative -Dquarkus.native.container-build=true -e
```

Here is the part of the cmd execution log.
```text
[INFO] --- maven-jar-plugin:2.4:jar (default-jar) @ code-with-quarkus ---
```
